Package clients

Provides the classes necessary to represent any hippodrome region on the client side of the execution. Its contents are a BettingCentreStub, a ControlCentreStub, a PaddockStub, a GeneralInformationRepositoryStub, a RacingTrackStub and a StableStub.
Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Hugo Fragata, Rui Lopes
See Also:
hippodrome, server, entities
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BettingCentreStub
    Representation of a place where the Spectators place their bets on the winning horse.
    ClientLauncher
    Main function which must be used to run the various entities classified on entities.
    ControlCentreStub
    Representation of a place where the Broker coordinates the race and where the Spectators come to relax and be entertained.
    GeneralInformationRepositoryStub
    Representation of a place where the entities log their state transitions.
    PaddockStub
    Representation of a place where the HorseJockeys show themselves to the Spectators.
    RacingTrackStub
    Representation of a place where the HorseJockeys run to win!
    StableStub
    Representation of a place where the HorseJockeys rest before and after each Race.
